OPTIONS_UNKNOWN_TYPE: Failed to get options for type '{{type}}' speak to a system administrator
FAILED_DEFAULT_OPTIONS_ISO3: Failed to get default options for iso3 '{{iso3}}' speak to a system administrator
MODEL_OPTIONS_FAIL:
Failed to construct model options from template and params:
{{message}}
FAILED_TO_SET_OPTIONS: Failed to find any valid options for control '{{control}}' speak to a system administrator
OPTIONS_OUTPUT_PROJECTION_QUARTER_HELP: Must be after calendar quarter to generate estimates.
OPTIONS_ADVANCED_OUTPUT_AWARE_HELP: Calculating awareness of HIV status indicators requires .shiny90 files to be included in each PJNZ. If .shiny90 files are not available, select 'No' to proceed with model fitting.
OPTIONS_ADVANCED_MAX_ITERATIONS_HELP: Maximum number of iteration for model run
OPTIONS_ADVANCED_NO_OF_SIMULATIONS_HELP: Number of simulatons for generating uncertainty ranges
OPTIONS_ADVANCED_SIMULATION_SEED_HELP: Random number generator seed for uncertainty sample
OPTIONS_ADVANCED_LOGIT_HELP: Logit offset for odds of obtaining ART in neighbouring district compared to home district
OPTIONS_USE_SURVEY_AGGREGATE_HELP: The uploaded survey dataset must be subsetted to exactly the data to be used in model calibration.
OPTIONS_ADVANCED_USE_KISH_HELP: Use Kish Effective Sample Size (ESS) for survey data likelihood
OPTIONS_ADVANCED_DEFF_PREVALENCE_HELP: Approximate DEFF to scale effective sample size for survey for HIV prevalence observations
OPTIONS_ADVANCED_DEFF_ART_COVERAGE_HELP: Approximate DEFF to scale effective sample size for survey for ART coverage
OPTIONS_ADVANCED_DEFF_PROPORTION_RECENT_: Approximate DEFF to scale effective sample size for survey for proportion recently infected amongst HIV positive
OPTIONS_CALIBRATION_ADJUST_TO_SPECTRUM_P: Calibrate to Spectrum mean total PLHIV.
OPTIONS_CALIBRATION_ADJUST_TO_SPECTRUM_A: Calibrate to Spectrum mean total on ART
Calibrate to Spectrum mean total number aware of HIV status from Shiny90
OPTIONS_CALIBRATION_ADJUST_TO_SPECTRUM_I: Calibrate to Spectrum mean total new infections
OPTIONS_CALIBRATION_DESCRIPTION: Options for calibrating to Spectrum outputs. If national Spectrum file, 'National' and 'Subnational' options will return the same result. Some calibrations will invalidate model inference to survey, ART programme, and ANC testing data. If calibration adjustments are large, it is recommended to review Spectrum results and Naomi input data rather than accept large calibration adjustments.
OPTIONS_CALIBRATION_ADJUST_TO_SPECTRUM_A: Adjust to Spectrum number on ART
Adjust to Spectrum number aware of HIV status
OPTIONS_CALIBRATION_ADJUST_TO_SPECTRUM_I: Adjust to Spectrum number of new infections
OPTIONS_OUTPUT_PROJECTION_QUARTER_LABEL: Calendar quarter to generate short-term projection
OPTIONS_SURVEY_DESCRIPTION: Select which survey to use for each indicator and whether to run the model with survey ART coverage or VLS.
OPTIONS_QUARTER1_LABEL: Calendar quarter at midpoint of survey
OPTIONS_ANC_DESCRIPTION: Optionally select which years of data to use at time point 1 and 2
OPTIONS_ANC_CLIENTS_LABEL: Data year to calibrate number of ANC clients
OPTIONS_ANC_MONTHS_LABEL: Months included in ANC reporting for ANC clients
OPTIONS_ANC_MONTHS_HELP: Number of months included in ANC reporting in this year.
OPTIONS_ANC_COVERAGE_LABEL: ART coverage prior to first ANC
OPTIONS_ART_DESCRIPTION: Select whether to include ART data or not in model run
OPTIONS_ART_NEIGHBOURING_DISTRICT_HELP: Model proportion of ART residents who seek treatment in neighboring districts
OPTIONS_ART_TIME_VARYING_ART_ATTEND_HELP: Allow the odds for seeking treatment in neighbouring district to change over time.
OPTIONS_POPULATION_CALIBRATION_DESCRIPTI: Options for calibrating to Spectrum population size. If national Spectrum file, 'National' and 'Subnational' options will return the same result. Calibration to Spectrum population is completed before model fitting.
OPTIONS_CALIBRATION_ADJUST_TO_SPECTRUM_P: Calibrate to Spectrum population size by sex and 5-year age group by national or subnational. If national Spectrum file, national and subnational will return the same result.
OPTIONS_ADVANCED_LOGIT_MEAN_LABEL: Logit prior mean for neighboring district attraction
OPTIONS_ADVANCED_PAED_15TO49F_PREVALENCE: Model paediatric prevalence to adult female prevalence
OPTIONS_RECENTLY_INFECTED_LABEL: Use survey data on proportion recently infected
OPTIONS_ADVANCED_DEFF_PROPORTION_RECENT_: Survey design effect - Proportion recently infected
CALIBRATION_LABEL_FAILED: Failed to find calibration option label with name '{{control_name}}' and id '{{value}}'.
